title: A short memory condition for infinitely divisible random fields
abstract:
This small note yields a sufficient condition for the short range dependence
of measurable stationary infinitely divisible moving average random fields with
$d$--dimensional index space. Here, the short/long range dependence concept in
borrowed from the paper of Kulik and Spodarev (2021). In the special case of
symmetric stable moving averages, our new condition coincides with the one from
the paper of Makogin et al. (2021).
